title: Adrishyam – The Invisible Heroes
overview: Always around but never seen, these unsung protectors of the nation are continuously working towards India’s protection behind the façade of being common folks. Starring Divyanka Tripathi and Eijaz Khan, ‘Adrishyam – The Invisible Heroes’ is the story of IB47, a premier intelligence agency in India whose members are fighting the never-ending war on terror and protecting the nation while balancing their personal lives and keeping their identities secret.
